title: swallow more logs while running tests which are intended to cause error msgs
body:
```
$> datalad test
Running unit tests for datalad
NumPy version 1.8.2
NumPy is installed in /usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/numpy
Python version 2.7.10 (default, Jul  1 2015, 10:54:53) [GCC 4.9.2]
nose version 1.3.6
................................2015-08-03 11:51:03,976 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| git-annex: notexistent.dat not found
| git-annex: add: 1 failed (cmd.py:317)
2015-08-03 11:51:03,976 [ERROR  ] Failed to run ['git-annex', 'add', 'notexistent.dat'] under '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_0lx7wa'. Exit code=1. out=(merging origin/git-annex into git-annex...)
| (recording state in git...)
| (recording state in git...)
|  err=git-annex: notexistent.dat not found
| git-annex: add: 1 failed
|  (cmd.py:263)
2015-08-03 11:51:03,993 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| git-annex: notexistent.dat not found
| git-annex: add: 1 failed (cmd.py:317)
2015-08-03 11:51:03,993 [ERROR  ] Failed to run ['git-annex', 'add', 'notexistent.dat'] under '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_0lx7wa'. Exit code=1. out= err=git-annex: notexistent.dat not found
| git-annex: add: 1 failed
|  (cmd.py:263)
..........2015-08-03 11:51:07,772 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| ok (cmd.py:317)
2015-08-03 11:51:07,848 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| ok (cmd.py:317)
.............2015-08-03 11:51:15,426 [ERROR  ] 'git clone -v /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_clone_url_nRvKKX /home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_Handle7DSpSx' returned with exit code 128
| stderr: 'fatal: destination path '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_Handle7DSpSx' already exists and is not an empty directory.
| ' (gitrepo.py:225)
........S.............................2015-08-03 11:51:56,185 [ERROR  ] Failed to start ['git', 'init']" under '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_ExecutionTimeExternalsProtocol_HvEwA'": [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_ExecutionTimeExternalsProtocol_HvEwA' (cmd.py:228)
.2015-08-03 11:51:56,203 [ERROR  ] Failed to start ['git', 'init']" under '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_ExecutionTimeProtocolcHBi5f'": [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_ExecutionTimeProtocolcHBi5f' (cmd.py:228)
..2015-08-03 11:51:56,523 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| Cloning into '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_cloneQ7V93Y'... (cmd.py:317)
2015-08-03 11:51:56,532 [ERROR  ] Protocol: NullProtocol: stderr| Cloning into '/home/yoh/.tmp/datalad_temp_test_clonepfHQhk'... (cmd.py:317)
...........2015-08-03 11:51:56,972 [WARNING] <function do_chdir at 0x7f32531b9ed8> changed cwd to /tmp. Mitigating and changing back to /tmp/venv (utils.py:534)
```
